Wyndholm

Island: Irathgar

Coordinates: 4726,2062

Description

Wyndholm is a coastal city perched on rugged cliffs, its sturdy stone walls overlooking the oft treacherous waters below, where trade ships cautiously sail into its well-guarded harbor.

Background

Once a stronghold against raiders, Wyndholm has grown into a prosperous hub for maritime trade, though it still bears the scars of its tumultuous past, with its towering fortress serving as a reminder of the city's long-held strategic importance.
